#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

A quick and easy way to export data from GWT to excel. Can be called from any GWT event.


= Details =

Change your aplication.gwt.xml
<inherits name='com.googlecode.gwtexcel.GWTExcel'/>

Change your web.xml
<servlet>
  <servlet-name>GWTExcel</servlet-name>
  <servlet-class>com.googlecode.gwtexcel.server.Export</servlet-class>
</servlet>
  <servlet-mapping>
  <servlet-name>GWTExcel</servlet-name>
  <url-pattern>/softruv/servletGWTExcelExport</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>

Max table size to post: 200000KB
After that you will receive: Exception: Form too large 2791485 > 200000
